item.title: Is This Wildly Overvalued Stock Market Doomed? Yes, but Maybe Not Yet
item.description: History shows no link between nosebleed valuations like we have today and returns over the next year. Expensive stocks can always get pricier.

item.title: India's Sensex Flat as Consumer, Industrial Stocks Support
item.description: India’s benchmark Sensex was flat as gains in consumer and industrial stocks helped offset losses in tech shares.

item.title: Trump names David Sacks as White House ‘AI and crypto czar’
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Thursday night that venture capitalist David Sacks will join his administration as “AI and crypto czar.”

item.title: Petco’s new CEO wants to make these changes to its stores, as shares gain
item.description: When Joel Anderson took the helm at Petco Health & Wellness Co. earlier this year, he said he wanted to improve the pet-supplies chain’s profitability...

item.title: HPE sees more than 30% growth in server sales as AI boom rolls on
item.description: HPE’s stock has been the most understated of the three big AI server names this year.
